title: Heartland Film Festival

author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Matthew Socey has an epic chat with Julia Ricci (senior programmer for Heartland Film Festival and fellow Ball State alum) about this year's Heartland Film Festival plus a lot of other cinema stuff.
